title: Paranthe Wali Gali
description: Famous for its variety of stuffed parathas, this place offers an authentic taste of Delhi street food.

title: Kake Di Hatti
description: Renowned for its North Indian vegetarian dishes, especially the stuffed naans and rich curries.

title: Karim's
description: An iconic eatery known for its Mughlai cuisine, including kebabs, biryanis, and curries.

title: Saravana Bhavan
description: Popular for its South Indian vegetarian cuisine, offering dosas, idlis, and thalis.

title: Bukhara
description: A luxurious dining experience offering North-West Frontier cuisine, famous for its kebabs and dal Bukhara.

title: Indian Accent
description: An upscale restaurant offering innovative Indian cuisine with a modern twist.

title: Haldiram's
description: A popular chain offering a wide variety of Indian snacks, sweets, and quick meals.

title: Lodi - The Garden Restaurant
description: Set in a lush garden, this restaurant offers a serene dining experience with a mix of European, Mediterranean, and Indian dishes.

title: Sitaram Diwan Chand
description: Famous for its Chole Bhature, this place is a must-visit for a hearty breakfast or lunch.

title: Cafe Lota
description: A contemporary cafe offering regional Indian dishes with a modern twist, set in a cultural ambiance.
